knowledge_additions.title: Y7 Science: Ecosystems & Kaitiakitanga Unit Complete
knowledge_additions.description: 3-lesson unit integrating traditional environmental stewardship with ecosystem science
knowledge_additions.curriculum_alignment: NZ Curriculum L4-5 Living World, Nature of Science

knowledge_additions.title: EcoRestore Interactive Game Prototype
knowledge_additions.description: Playable web simulation for ecosystem restoration with resource management and strategy mechanics

knowledge_additions.title: Y8 Geography: Māori Navigation & Mapmaking Unit
knowledge_additions.description: Revolutionary geography unit connecting traditional wayfinding to modern spatial science

knowledge_additions.title: Y9 Chemistry: Traditional Dyes & Material Science Unit
knowledge_additions.description: Chemistry unit exploring harakeke processing, natural dyes, and uku pigments through mātauranga lens
knowledge_additions.curriculum_alignment: NZ Curriculum L5 Material World, Chemical Reactions

knowledge_additions.title: Y10 Digital Tech: Data Sovereignty & Māori Digital Futures Unit
knowledge_additions.description: Critical digital literacy unit on Indigenous data rights, CARE principles, and ethical tech design
knowledge_additions.curriculum_alignment: Digital Technologies L6 Ethics & Society, Computational Thinking
knowledge_additions.contemporary_relevance: addresses AI, algorithms, privacy, Te Mana Raraunga framework

knowledge_additions.title: Y7 Maths: Kōwhaiwhai & Geometric Patterns Unit
knowledge_additions.description: Mathematics unit exploring symmetry and transformations through traditional Māori rafter designs
knowledge_additions.curriculum_alignment: NZ Curriculum L4 Geometry, Patterns & Relationships
knowledge_additions.cross_curricular: links to Visual Arts, cultural studies

methodology.cultural_framework: Te Ao Māori integration with contemporary curriculum
methodology.assessment: Cultural STEM Assessment Rubric applied throughout
methodology.teacher_pd: PD notes embedded in every lesson
methodology.differentiation: Support, core, and extension pathways provided

recommendations_for_graphrag.action: Index all new files to resources table
